short_summary: Amendment to Closing Time: Bidder must submit bid by 14:00 EST on 2024-02-29
description: provision to Transport Canada access to macroeconomic, industry, and trade, forecasts and research reports for a period of one year, with options for three additional one-year extensions on an annual basis
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

# Access to Economic Forecasts and Reports

### Announcement Details

| Title (English)                                                      | Title (French)                                              |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- |
| Access to Economic Forecasts and Reports                              | Accès aux prévisions et rapports économiques                 |

### Important Dates

*   Publication Date: Feb 9, 2024
*   Tender Closing Date: Feb 29, 2024 at 14:00 EST
*   Expected Contract Start Date: March 28, 2024
*   Expected Contract End Date: Not specified

### Contract Details

*   Procurement Category: Goods and Services (GD)
*   Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
*   UNSPSC (United Nations Standard Products and Services Code): 81111902
*   UNSPSC Description (English): Online database information retrieval service
*   UNSPSC Description (French): Recherche d'informations de base de données en ligne

### Selection Criteria

*   The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Trade Agreements

*   This contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

### Contracting Entity

*   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

*   Lionel James (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Email: <l Lionel.james@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*   Phone: None

### Additional Information

*   The original notification can be found on the [Ariba Discovery website](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18750262?extsite=MTg3NTAyNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
*   Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by Feb 29, 2024 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
*   The objective of the contract is to provide Transport Canada with access to macroeconomic, industry, and trade forecasts and research reports for a period of one year, with options for three additional one-year extensions on
